story opening passage.title: Beginnings
story opening passage.content: You are standing at the edge of a dense forest. You see a path leading into the forest.

story current passage.title: Beginnings
story current passage.content: You are standing at the edge of a dense forest. You see a path leading into the forest.

story passages.title: Altar
story passages.content: As you approach the altar, you see that there is a small, ornate box inside.

story passages.title: Dungeon
story passages.content: You fight the guards, but they overpower you and throw you into the dungeon.

story passages.title: Fight guardian
story passages.content: You decided to attack the guardian, but quickly realize that it was a mistake as the guardian easily defeats you.

story passages.title: Clearing
story passages.content: As you make your way through the forest, you come across a small clearing. In the center of the clearing is an altar.

story passages.title: Treasure
story passages.content: You open the box and find a glittering gem inside. Suddenly, you hear a rustling in the bushes behind you.

links.text: Leave the clearing and continue through the forest

story passages.title: Gold chest
story passages.content: You find a lot of gold in the chest. You decide to take the gold with you and go back to the main path.

story passages.title: Deeper into the forest
story passages.content: You continue to make your way through the forest, and you see an another path.

story passages.title: Castle
story passages.content: You come across an old castle in the middle of the forest. The gate is closed, and there are stone guards patrolling the perimeter.

story passages.title: Continue journey
story passages.content: After explaining your quest to the guardian, it grants you permission to continue through the forest and find what you seek.

story passages.title: Ran from monster
story passages.content: You quickly turn around and run back the way you came. The monster catches up to you, and it is all over.

story passages.title: Fight troll
story passages.content: You choose your weapon and prepare to fight the troll.

story passages.title: Guardian
story passages.content: As you approach the tree, a mysterious figure appears. It introduces itself as the guardian of the forest and asks why you have come.

story passages.title: Troll
story passages.content: A troll emerges from the bushes, its eyes fixed on the gem in your hand.

story passages.title: Forest's Heart
story passages.content: You continue through the forest and eventually find yourself in a clearing at the center of the forest. In the center of the clearing, you see a large, ancient tree.

story passages.title: Fight monster
story passages.content: The monster charges at you. You quickly draw your weapon and attack it.

story passages.title: Throne Room
story passages.content: You successfully sneak past the guards and find yourself in the throne room. You see a treasure chest next to the throne.

story passages.title: Final Showdown
story passages.content: You finally reach the end of the forest and find what you have been searching for. But before you can claim it, a fierce monster appears.

story passages.title: Ran from Troll
story passages.content: You start running from the troll, but it catches up to you, and you die.

story passages.title: Victory
story passages.content: You emerge victorious after the battle. You claim your prize and leave the forest a hero.
